content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-14.5, -48.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0) extracting iron ore.
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5) storing iron ore.
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Stone Furnace at position (-11.0, -48.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Stone Furnace at position (-9.0, -48.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -46.5) transferring items between entities.
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -45.5) transferring items between entities.
- Iron Chest at position (-14.5, -47.5) for storage.

### Coal and Iron Ore Extraction Facility at Position (41.5, -80.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0) extracting coal.
- Iron Chest at position (41.5, -80.5) storing coal.
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0) smelting resources.
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5) transferring items between entities.
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -79.5) for storage.

## ERROR TIPS

### Inserter Waiting for Source Items
- Ensure that the inserters are correctly positioned and have access to source items. Check if the source entities have items available for the inserters to pick up.

### Chest at Drop Position is Full
- Regularly check and empty chests at drop positions to prevent mining drills from stopping due to full storage.

### No Ingredients to Smelt
- Ensure that furnaces have a continuous supply of raw materials to maintain production efficiency. Regularly insert iron ore into furnaces to keep them operational.
